train.description: ASCEND (A Spontaneous Chinese-English Dataset) introduces a high-quality resource of spontaneous multi-turn conversational dialogue Chinese-English code-switching corpus collected in Hong Kong. ASCEND consists of 10.62 hours of spontaneous speech with a total of ~12.3K utterances. The corpus is split into 3 sets: training, validation, and test with a ratio of 8:1:1 while maintaining a balanced gender proportion on each set.
